TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontSizeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Converts font size values to and from other type representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The object supports conversion to and from the following types: include , , , and . There is no actual `FontSize` type, but values for font sizes are generally typed as , so the converter's destination type is . ## XAML Text Usage
